description: Try our easy to follow Lamb Miso Ramen Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ramen,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,High protein,Lamb,Winter,Low sugar,Mushroom
name: Lamb Miso Ramen Noodles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Brush steaks with half the miso paste, preheat a lightly oiled chargrill pan or BBQ and chargrill lamb for 3-4 minutes per side or until cooked to your liking. Rest for 5 minutes and slice.
Heat oil in a wok and stir fry beans, carrot and mushrooms until lightly coloured. Add miso and 2 cups water, noodles and soy and cook for 4-5 minutes until noodles are just heated through.
Divide noodles, vegetables and soup between serving bowls.
Top noodles with sliced lamb, spring onions and chilli, if desired.
